translations: n.恶臭，异味；丑闻；讨厌的人
v.发出恶臭；惹人讨厌；质量极差（stink 的过去分词）

phrs.translation: 发臭, 发恶臭的, 发育不良

sentences.sentence: This was, of course, one of the hottest days of the year, and the trash stunk to high heaven.
sentences.translation: 当然，这是一年中最热的那几天，垃圾一直臭到半空中。

sentences.sentence: Yao had one of his worst games since he came back from his toe injury last night. He just stunk tonight.
sentences.translation: 姚打了一场自从他昨晚从脚趾受伤复出后最差的比赛之一。他今晚打的真臭。

sentences.sentence: It had stunk for several days, and at first, I'd thought I was imagining the fishy odor, but it had become more pronounced.
sentences.translation: 几天来，一直都有臭味，起先，我以为那股鱼腥味是我的幻觉，可是味道越来越明显。
